media_content_id.name: Media content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to play. Platform dependent.

media_content_type.name: Media content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to play. Must be one of MUSIC, TVSHOW, VIDEO, EPISODE, CHANNEL or PLAYLIST MUSIC.

extract_media_url.name: Get Media URL
extract_media_url.description: Extract media URL from a service.

url.name: Media URL
url.description: URL where the media can be found.

format_query.name: Format query
format_query.description: Youtube-dl query to select the quality of the result.
